root.name: Hakuoki: Warriors of the Shinsengumi
root.description: OverviewHakuoki: Warriors of the Shinsengumi is a spin-off from the Hakuoki series of otome games. Rather than being a visual novel, it is a hack n' slash action game with gameplay similar to the Dynasty Warriors series. It features 6 playable characters, and several campaigns with both retellings of the events of the first Hakuoki game and non-canon "what if" scenarios.
